content: leave enough thread for sewing skirt *crochet the 1st row grasping front loops of the 18th row *crochet with the closed row begin row with 1 chain and end it with the slip_stitch in the first stitch of the row *make 4-hcd puff stitches with another color 1 round 4 single_crochet increase х 6 36 2 round 5 single_crochet puff st х 6 times 36 3 round 5 single_crochet increase х 6 42 4 round 1 single_crochet in each st around 42 5 round 2 single_crochet puff st 6 single_crochet puff st х 5 times 4 single_crochet 42 6 round 6 single_crochet increase х 6 48 7 round 1 single_crochet in each st around 48 8 round 6 single_crochet puff st 7 single_crochet puff st х 5 times 1 single_crochet 48 9 round 7 single_crochet increase х 6 54 10 round 1 single_crochet in each st around 54 11 round slip_stitch in each st around cut the yarn and fasten_off assembly and decoration attach the legs using the thread fastening like this https //youtu be/rply3pzimy0 embroider the nose sew ears and eyes glue black half beads embroider the cheeks with pink thread a couple of stitches are enough sew the tail make a small pompon and attach it to the neck our little panda is ready ©marina chuchkalova mycrochetwonders 2018 little panda free crochet pattern while publishing your photos in instagram do not forget to mark me @mycrochetwonders and also add a hashtag #design_by_chuchkalova you can always find the other crochet patterns in my etsy-shop https //www etsy com/shop/mycrowonders new free patterns on ravelry https //www ravelry com/stores/mycrochetwonders 6 thank you for crocheting with me see you soon ©marina chuchkalova mycrochetwonders 2018 little panda free crochet pattern
